item.title: budbar
item.description: Polybar is a great statusbar that works well with i3 and other window managers, this is my config file. It uses some custom scripts to display some information. ss-17-11-22-pbarro.png In the screenshot above you can see polybar at the top of the screen. I use i3fyra to achieve the layout. Container A(vivaldi/wg) and B(irssi) are tabbed and container C is horizontally split with three urxvt instances. I use some custom scripts to display some of the information in my polybar.
